entry.title: Brother Printers Authentication Bypass via Default Admin Password Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Brother Printers Authentication Bypass via Default Admin Password Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-51978

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 通过泄露目标设备的序列号，远程攻击者可以生成目标设备的默认管理员密码。目标设备可能通过未经身份验证的HTTP、HTTPS、IPP、SNMP或PJL请求泄露其序列号。

产品厂商： Brother

产品名称： Brother Printers

搜索语法： app=”brother-Printer”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12517

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Is there an existing template for this?

  • I have searched the existing templates.

Nuclei Template

Relevant dumped responses

Anything else?

The template fails quietly if target web site does not return a CSRF token in its response checked in this snippet:

extractors:  - type: regex    part: body    name: logbox    group: 1    regex:      - 'id="LogBox" name="(.*?)"'    internal: true  - type: regex    part: body    name: csrf    group: 1    regex:      - 'id="CSRFToken" name="CSRFToken" value="(.*?)"'    internal: true

Example output:
[WRN] [CVE-2024-51978] Could not make http request for https://xxx.xx.xx.xx: unresolved variables found: urlencode(csrf)

A website which does not return any token can still be vulnerable. As you can see in the first screenshot, it does not find the vulnerability

When i send CSRFToken value as empty, it does find it

The template should handle both situations. My suggestion is to send two seperate POST requests, one with csrf and one without it:
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Brother Printers Authentication Bypass

entry.title: Sudo 本地权限提升漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sudo 本地权限提升漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32463

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Sudo是一个在Unix-like系统上广泛使用的命令行工具，允许授权用户以提升的权限执行命令。Stratascale Cyber Research Unit (CRU)发现了Sudo中的两个本地权限提升漏洞之一，即CVE-2025-32463。该漏洞影响Sudo版本1.9.14至1.9.17，允许未授权的本地用户通过滥用–chroot (-R)选项获得root访问权限，即使用户没有定义sudo规则。此存储库提供了一个Python概念验证(PoC)重新实现了CRU团队开发的原始Bash利用程序，展示了如何通过用户控制的chroot环境中的精心制作的nsswitch.conf文件实现任意代码执行。

产品名称： Sudo

影响版本： 1.9.14 <= version <= 1.9.17

来源： https://github.com/pevinkumar10/CVE-2025-32463

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • exploit.py

来源概述

📘 Introduction

Sudo is a widely used command-line utility on Unix-like systems that allows permitted users to execute commands with elevated privileges. It plays a critical role in enforcing the principle of least privilege and maintaining a secure audit trail of administrative activities.
The Stratascale Cyber Research Unit (CRU) discovered two local privilege escalation vulnerabilities in Sudo, one of which is CVE-2025-32463. This vulnerability affects Sudo versions 1.9.14 through 1.9.17, and allows unprivileged local users to gain root access by abusing the –chroot (-R) option, even if no sudo rules are defined for the user.
This repository provides a Python proof-of-concept (PoC) reimplementation of the original Bash exploit developed by the CRU team. It demonstrates how to achieve arbitrary code execution as root via a crafted nsswitch.conf file inside a user-controlled chroot environment.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sudo 本地权限提升漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-0171

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS和IOS XE软件中的Smart Install协议存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。未经身份验证的远程攻击者可以通过向受影响设备的TCP端口4786发送特制的Smart Install消息来利用此漏洞。成功利用此漏洞可能导致攻击者在受影响设备上执行任意代码、造成拒绝服务（设备重新启动）或使设备陷入消耗CPU资源的无限循环中。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco IOS

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios” banner=”cisco” && port=”4786”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/e5d3813f4180c7cf83ee4729ebd2654f61cdc178/network%2Fcves%2F2018%2FCVE-2018-0171.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: CVE-2025-47812
entry.content:
描述： ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

On June 30, 2025 a detailed technical analysis of CVE-2025-47812 was published by the original finders, RCE Security. This analysis shows how an anonymous user (with no password), can leverage a NULL byte injection issue, allowing for arbitrary attacker-controlled LUA code to be placed in a session file. An attacker can then execute this arbitrary LUA code to achieve RCE. The technical analysis shows this occurring with root privileges by default on a Linux based system, and notes that on Windows, code execution will be as NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM.

On July 1, 2025, a Metasploit exploit module for CVE-2025-47812 was added the Metasploit pull queue.

Given this is a file transfer server, is vulnerable to unauthenticated RCE, and public exploit code is available, I have rated this as Extremely High attacker Value, and Extremely High exploitability.

entry.title: The education theme for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to,
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-v5pf-366x-4gxg

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-13786

  • https://themeforest.net/item/education-center-training-courses-wordpress-theme/10652918#item-description__change-log

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/d0b27bc8-617a-4f98-954f-e49f87dca311?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-v5pf-366x-4gxg

描述：

The education theme for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to, and including, 3.6.10 via deserialization of untrusted input in the ‘themerex_callback_view_more_posts’ function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject a PHP Object. No known POP chain is present in the vulnerable software, which means this vulnerability has no impact unless another plugin or theme containing a POP chain is installed on the site. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it may allow the attacker to perform actions like delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code depending on the POP chain present.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-v5pf-366x-4gxg

entry.title: FortiOS 测试环境漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FortiOS 测试环境漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-23113

漏洞类型： 其他

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 这是一个Docker基础的测试环境，用于验证CVE-2024-23113 Nuclei模板对模拟的易受攻击的FortiOS实例的检测能力。它提供了包括登录页面、API端点和正确的版本信息在内的真实FortiOS响应。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiOS

影响版本： 7.4.0, 7.4.1, 7.4.2, 7.2.0 through 7.2.6, 7.0.0 through 7.0.13

来源： https://github.com/MAVRICK-1/cve-2024-23113-test-env

类型： CVE-2024:github search

仓库文件

  • .dockerignore
  • Dockerfile
  • README.md
  • docker-compose.yml
  • server.py

来源概述

CVE-2024-23113 FortiOS Test Environment

A Docker-based test environment for validating CVE-2024-23113 Nuclei templates against simulated vulnerable FortiOS instances.

🔍 Overview

This environment simulates vulnerable FortiOS HTTP interfaces to test the detection capabilities of CVE-2024-23113 Nuclei templates. It provides realistic FortiOS responses including login pages, API endpoints, and proper version information.

🚀 Quick Start

Prerequisites

  • Docker
  • Docker Compose
  • Nuclei (for testing)

Basic Setup

  1. Clone and build:
  1. Verify the environment:
  1. Test with Nuclei:

🎯 Available Environments

Default Environment

  • Service: fortios-vulnerable
  • Port: 8080
  • Version: FortiOS v7.2.5 (vulnerable)
  • URL: http://localhost:8080

Additional Test Environments

Available Profiles:
  • Default: FortiOS v7.2.5 (vulnerable) - Port 8080
  • Patched: FortiOS v7.2.7 (patched) - Port 8081
  • Multiple:
    • FortiOS v7.4.1 (vulnerable) - Port 8082
    • FortiOS v7.0.10 (vulnerable) - Port 8083

🔧 Configuration

Environment Variables

VariableDescriptionDefault
FORTIOS_VERSIONFortiOS version to simulate7.2.5
PORTContainer internal port8080

Custom Version

📡 API Endpoints

The simulated FortiOS provides these endpoints:

EndpointDescriptionContent-Type
/Main login pagetext/html
/loginLogin formtext/html
/remote/loginRemote access portaltext/html
/api/v2/monitor/system/statusSystem status APIapplication/json
/api/v2/cmdb/system/globalGlobal config APIapplication/json

Example API Response

🧪 Testing Scenarios

Vulnerable Versions Detection

Patched Version Validation

Batch Testing

🔍 Manual Testing

Check Service Response

Expected Vulnerable Indicators

  • HTML: Contains FortiOS v7.2.5
  • Server Header: FortiGate-HTTP/v7.2.5
  • API Response: "version": "v7.2.5"

🐛 Troubleshooting

Common Issues

Port Already in Use
Container Won’t Start
Health Check Failing

Debugging

📋 Vulnerable Versions

This environment can simulate any of these vulnerable versions:

FortiOS

  • 7.4.0, 7.4.1, 7.4.2
  • 7.2.0 through 7.2.6
  • 7.0.0 through 7.0.13

FortiProxy

  • 7.4.0, 7.4.1, 7.4.2
  • 7.2.0 through 7.2.8
  • 7.0.0 through 7.0.14

Example Usage

🏗️ Development

Building from Source

Customizing Responses

Edit server.py to modify:

  • HTML responses
  • API endpoint data
  • Server headers
  • Version information

⚠️ Security Notice

This is a test environment only:

  • ✅ Use for security testing and template validation
  • ✅ Use in isolated lab environments
  • ❌ Never expose to public networks
  • ❌ Never use in production

📚 References

  • CVE-2024-23113 Details
  • Fortinet Security Advisory
  • CISA KEV Catalog
  • Nuclei Templates Repository

📞 Support

For issues with this test environment:

  1. Check the troubleshooting section
  2. Review container logs
  3. Verify Nuclei template syntax
  4. Test with manual curl requests

Remember: This environment is for authorized security testing only. Always ensure you have permission before testing any systems.
